text: [Music]
if I was to use one word to describe AWS
uh it would
be brilliant life-saving that's two
words um fantastic Stressless no that's
not really a word is it um stress
reducing money reducing
[Music]
I'm Derek kapam the CTO and co-founder
of photo Merchant and uh we're a Sydney
based uh web startup photo Merchant is
an online platform for photographers uh
it's focused on enabling photographers
to get online so that includes their
photos their sales their business
management and all of the all of the
social interactions so what we do is our
platform enables them
to have a full online presence within 5
minutes of signing up when we are
presented with a challenge or any kind
of uh solution or problem that we need
to solve the first question we ask
ourselves usually is can AWS do what we
need to do uh historically over four
years of operation the answer has
usually always been yes um or at least
provides us with a platform to solve the
problem I've personally been using AWS
since 2006 when ec2 was launched um and
when we started building the business
and building the software in
2007 uh we had a storage issue we were
looking at um traditional storage
methods and we were looking at $2 $3 for
a gigabyte but it had to be
pre-provisioned we needed to buy that up
front so in 2007 roughly when Amazon
launched
S3 uh that's when we really started
using it during development as we have
grown
and had more and more of these big
issues that would traditionally have
cost us a lot of money Amazon have
launched a new feature or they've
launched a new service just in time for
us to solve that problem and we've been
able to bring that feature on board and
and some of the big ones were sqs so the
queuing uh S3 obviously recently glacia
has started saving us a lot of money AWS
enables us to grow at the speed in which
our customers are demanding it that we
grow so it's enabled us to be adaptive
flexible and um scalable as a
[Music]
business
